'''''Footprints of the Traveler''''' is the version trailer [[soundtrack]] album and the thirteenth album released for ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

It features tracks produced by the [[HOYO-MiX]] team, each one an original composition for the version trailers of ''Genshin Impact'' since [[Version 1.1]].

The album was first announced on August 13, 2022, during the [[Special Program]] for [[Version 3.0]]. The tracklist was announced on September 19 and the album was released on September 20.<ref>Bilibili: [https://t.bilibili.com/707474078370365457?spm_id_from=333.999.0.0 「《原神》版本PV主题OST即将上线 」]</ref>
